snippet.title: BAGDEX - PRE SALE TRAILER
snippet.description:
The pre-sale of Bagdex, the Brazilian monster tamer, has arrived! The PC version of the game can now be purchased at Nuuvem through the link: https://www.nuuvem.com/lp/pt/bagdex

Bagdex is a turn-based RPG focused on exploration, collection, and battles with fantastic creatures – the Bagmons! Step into the shoes of a young Bagmon Researcher and explore the vast and humorous world of Brasilis – a place that feels familiar yet completely different!


Face off against and team up with over 160 species, divided into 20 different Essence Types! Evolve your Bagmons into even more powerful forms and enhance their attributes to tackle epic battles!

Manage the Training Center – a customizable base where you can train your team, increase your friendship level with your Bagmons, cultivate your farm, cook traditional Brazilian recipes, fish, and decorate however you like!

Choose your Starting Village and explore the five regions of the world your way! Brasilis is a land full of mysteries, with dozens of quirky trainers to challenge, mysterious Ruins to uncover, and countless secrets to find!

Face opponents in tactical combat with over 200 moves and dozens of unique passive abilities! A solid strategy is key to conquering challenging battles – test your skills at the Brasilis Network Studios and against the infamous Tru-K Crew’s mischief!


All players who purchase Bagdex during the pre-sale will receive an exclusive backpack skin! In addition, it is also possible to purchase from the game:

The official digital artbook of the project;
The original soundtrack in high quality;
One official digital webcomic!

Wishlist on Steam! Free Battle Demo Available 12/18
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3361480/Bagdex/

Be sure to follow the official profile on social media for Bagmons revelations and sneak peeks of the game!

Instagram: @bagdexoficial | https://www.instagram.com/bagdexoficial/ 
X: @bagdexoficial | https://x.com/GamesCaramelo 
TikTok: @bagdexoficial | https://www.tiktok.com/@bagdexoficial 
Site oficial: www.caramelogames.com.br

Developer: Caramelo Games
Partners: Dumativa, Castro Brothers
Publisher: Nuuvem
